description: Run the unit tests to validate the command parsing, history, and basic editing implementation.
instructions: Navigate to the root directory of the project.
Ensure you have the necessary dependencies installed (e.g., by running `pip install -r requirements.txt`).
Execute the specific unit test file using pytest: `pytest tests/unit/test_terminal_command_parser.py`.
constraints: The tests must be run from the project's root directory.
All required dependencies must be installed.
validation_criteria: The pytest command should complete without errors.
All individual tests within `tests/unit/test_terminal_command_parser.py` must report as 'PASSED'.
name: validate_command_parsing_and_basic_features
